While the game is old, it's still THE good and fun tactical shooter. Besides toxicity, it requires a high skill level and strategic thinking (sometimes) so the community is pretty good and teams should work together. Overall the gamemodes are relatively fun, and you can play the comp, casual or stuff like gungame.

If you want to play a more modernized version of this game that's a little easier in terms of gunplay, just go play valorant, but overall, game is fun, arms race and casual is really easy to play with friends, and it's chill

Great game overall.
